Project.Brief history of your project and organi: makecx  Culture Media Co., Ltd. was established in 2016. It is a cultural enterprise with animation content creation as its core. It is formed by the core planning team, operation team, creative team and production team of former Bilibili, former Mili Film, Oriental DreamWorks, Hengdian Film and Television Group. The company's main business includes original animation development, animation IP planning and operation, The whole process of 2D and 3D animation production. The company has participated in the planning, operation, creation and production of many high-end projects at home and abroad such as animation films, animation dramas, animation CG, and live shooting, providing high-quality services to customers at home and abroad, and improving the commercial value of operating projects with professional operation methods. In the original development of animation, we cooperate with upstream and downstream enterprises in the industry chain to create a closed loop of the animation industry. The company digs deep into the traditional culture of "China Five Thousand Years", passes on the excellent traditional Chinese culture to children through animation, and creates the smiling faces of the next generation of human beings.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: We are a cultural enterprise with animation content creation as the core. It is composed of the core planning team, operation team, creative team and production team of the original Bilibili, the original Mi Li Film, Oriental DreamWorks, and Hengdian Film and Television Group. The company's main business includes original animation development, animation IP planning and operation, and the whole process of 2D and 3D animation production. In this process, a large number of real and valuable film and television resources, video pictures, etc. have been generated, and we hope that they can be effectively preserved.
